mapper.select: select *from (select rownum rn,tt.*from (select noticeboard_seq,noticeboard_adminEmail,noticeboard_title,noticeboard_content,noticeboard_hit,to_char(to_date(noticeboard_logtime),'YYYY.MM.DD') noticeboard_logtime from noticeboard order by noticeboard_seq desc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select mb.*, mm.member_name, mm.member_profile, mt.mentor_company, mt.mentor_department from meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mt.mentor_email = mm.member_email order by meetingboard_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, tt.* FROM ( SELECT e.essayboard_seq, e.essayboard_title, e.essayboard_content, e.essayboard_scrap, e.essayboard_logtime, mm.member_name, mm.member_seq, mm.member_profile, mt.mentor_company, mt.mentor_department, mt.mentor_flag, mt.mentor_email FROM essayboard e, mentor mt, mentors_member mm WHERE e.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email AND mt.mentor_email = mm.member_email ORDER BY essayboard_logtime DESC ) tt) WHERE
rn >= #{startNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} and rn <= #{endNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from( select rownum rn , tt.* from( select menteeboard_seq,menteeboard_email,m.member_profile,m.member_nickname,menteeboard_title,menteeboard_content, j.job_type, menteeboard_good,menteeboard_ref,menteeboard_lev,menteeboard_step,menteeboard_pseq,menteeboard_reply,menteeboard_hit,menteeboard_logtime from menteeboard a, job j, mentors_member m where a.job_code = j.job_code and a.menteeboard_email = m.member_email order by menteeboard_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
